bibl.title: Prolegomena to a Syntax of the Greek Papyri.
Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume II
bibl.author: PORTER, Stanley E.

bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Current Grammatical and Syntactical Resources: A. Articles; - B. Editions; - C. Grammars; - D. Devoted Monographs; - E. Incidental Monographs. - 3. Factors to Consider in Developing a Syntax of the Papyri. - 4. Conclusion.
PORTER Stanley E., Prolegomena to a Syntax of the Greek Papyri.

Jaakko FRÖSÉN, Tiina PUROLA and Erja SALMENKIVI (Edd.), Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume II = Commentationes Humanarum Litterarum. 122, 2, 2007 (Helsinki, 2007) pp. 921-933.
